title: Food and Product Labeling Litigation and Regulatory Update: Trick or Treat Edition

media:group.media:title: Food and Product Labeling Litigation and Regulatory Update: Trick or Treat Edition
media:group.media:description:
October 20, 2022

Please join McGuireWoods for our next quarterly Food and Product Labeling Litigation and Regulatory Update, covering recent regulatory and litigation developments facing the product manufacturing, food and beverage, and retail industries.

Class actions targeting food and product labeling and related business practices continue to be filed at a spine-chilling pace. And the regulatory environment is just as blood-curdling. Our quarterly webinar will help you navigate these spooky labyrinths by shedding some light on recent developments. The presentation will include a brief section on the upcoming U.S. Supreme Court term, highlighting cases on the docket that may impact the food and beverage and consumer product space, plus emerging trends for 2023.
Come trick or treat with us — one lucky attendee will win a gourmet treat from an acclaimed artisan chocolatier.

For more details on the series, please visit: https://www.mcguirewoods.com/events/firm-events/2022/10/food-product-labeling-series

Videos may include attorney advertising and aren’t legal advice/opinion. Prior successes ≠ future results.
